title: AMPS to Spotlight ClaimInsight at CAHP 2025, Delivering a Smarter Future for Payment Integrity in California
content:
PHOENIX, Aug. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As the California healthcare system faces unprecedented financial strain and legislative complexity, Advanced Medical Pricing Solutions (AMPS) will bring a powerful cost containment solution to center stage at the California Association of Health Plans (CAHP) Annual Conference, September 29–October 1, 2025. AMPS, a Silver Sponsor of the event, will showcase its ClaimInsight® platform to California payers seeking smarter, more scalable ways to drive payment integrity before dollars are lost.

With California reversing course on critical Medi-Cal investments and federal changes threatening coverage, payers are under intense pressure to “do more with less.” ClaimInsight enables plans to take back control, reducing overpayments, improving claim accuracy, and optimizing operations through real-time, physician-informed claims editing.

“We’re excited to partner with CAHP and California payers during such a critical inflection point,” said Mark Noel, General Manager and SVP of ClaimInsight. “Health plans are facing hard choices. ClaimInsight is purpose-built to help them safeguard resources without compromising care. We look forward to sharing how we’re delivering measurable savings and operational clarity with plans across the state.”

Attendees will get first access to strategic discussions on the ClaimInsight roadmap, exclusive payer use cases, and new developments that address California’s most urgent healthcare cost challenges—including Medi-Cal claim optimization, increased data coordination, and streamlined prepay integrity processes.

Meet us at CAHP Booth 405 to explore how ClaimInsight is helping health plans drive affordability, accuracy, and agility in the face of mounting economic and regulatory headwinds.

To schedule a meeting with the AMPS team, contact claiminsights@amps.com.

About AMPS®

Advanced Medical Pricing Solutions (AMPS) delivers smarter, data-driven solutions that empower payers to manage healthcare costs with confidence. At the core of our offering is ClaimInsight, a prospective payment integrity solution that automates rules-based claim review and editing—ensuring accuracy, compliance, and defensibility in every payment decision.

Backed by deep industry expertise, advanced analytics, and a people-first approach, AMPS helps payers optimize financial and clinical outcomes while turning healthcare cost containment into a strategic advantage.

Founded in 2005, AMPS is a diversified healthcare technology company serving self-insured employers, health plans, TPAs, and market aggregators. Our portfolio includes proprietary SaaS products and tech-enabled services across prospective claim editing and high-dollar medical bill review (ClaimInsight), direct contracting, reference-based pricing (PriceDynamix™), and transparent pharmacy benefit solutions (Drexi™).

For more information, visit www.ClaimInsight.com or www.amps.com.

For press inquiries, please contact:

Lauren Burke, Dr. Sales and Marketing, ClaimInsight

LBurke@amps.com
summary: Advanced Medical Pricing Solutions (AMPS) will showcase its ClaimInsight platform at the California Association of Health Plans (CAHP) Annual Conference, September 29-October 1, 2025. AMPS aims to provide a cost containment solution to California payers facing financial strain and legislative complexity. The platform enables plans to take back control, reduce overpayments, improve claim accuracy, and optimize operations through real-time, physician-informed claims editing. Attendees will also have access to strategic discussions on the ClaimIn Insight roadmap, exclusive payer use cases, and new developments addressing California's most urgent healthcare cost challenges.
shortSummary: Advanced Medical Pricing Solutions (AMPS) will showcase its ClaimInsight platform at the CAHP 2025, focusing on cost containment solutions for California's healthcare system amid severe financial and regulatory challenges.

scraped_sources.text:
As a leader in healthcare cost reduction for self-funded organizations, AMPS is dedicated to transforming how businesses manage their healthcare spend. With nearly two decades of expertise, we go beyond cost containment by delivering innovative, member-centric solutions that drive savings while maintaining high-quality care. Our commitment to integrity and personalized service empowers organizations to take control of their healthcare costs without compromising the well-being of their members. Trust AMPS to be your partner in achieving sustainable healthcare savings through proven strategies and cutting-edge solutions.
At AMPS, we understand that every organization faces unique challenges when it comes to healthcare costs. That’s why we take a flexible, personalized approach to help you meet those challenges head-on. Whether you're a self-funded employer, TPA, or payor, our customizable solutions—PriceDynamix, Drexi PBM, and ClaimInsight—are designed to fit your specific needs. We meet you where you are and work alongside you to craft the best strategy for maximizing savings while ensuring your members receive the care they deserve.
Our unique value proposition exists in our three core solutions—PriceDynamix, ClaimInsight, and Drexi—designed to reduce costs and enhance the member experience. Whether working together or independently, these solutions offer the flexibility, precision, and savings that your organization deserves.
PriceDynamix by AMPS delivers unparalleled savings through precise claim repricing powered by our proprietary technology. We combine member-centric care with unmatched accuracy, ensuring fair pricing, significant cost reductions, and a dynamic healthcare experience for clients and members alike.
Learn MoreOur cutting-edge claims editing technology and physician-led Medical Bill Review maximize payment accuracy, reduce costs, and ensure efficient claims processing, delivering exceptional savings and innovative Payment Integrity solutions.
Learn MoreDrexi is transforming pharmacy benefit management with a commitment to excellence and integrity. Our innovative technology solutions empower plans and members to take control of their healthcare by effectively managing prescription costs while delivering unmatched savings and benefits.
Learn More

ClaimInsight by AMPS is not just another payment integrity tool, it’s a transformative payment integrity platform designed to solve the most frustrating challenges plaguing payers and third-party administrators (TPAs): waste and abuse in medical spend, lack of transparency, costly contingency models, outdated technology, and inadequate high-dollar claim reviews.
Savings with a 160K Life Medicaid Plan
Annual Savings per 500K Members for High-Dollar Claim Review
Prevention of Overpayment
“AMPS HDR’s itemized bill review uncovered savings we didn’t know were possible and their unique approach gave us confidence in the results. We’ve seen fewer appeals and even stronger cooperation with providers since launching the service.”
Traditional payment integrity tools often fall short—focusing only on surface-level errors, using outdated rules engines, and offering little transparency behind millions in decisions. ClaimInsight breaks that mold. Backed by 25 years in the market, and over 50 years of executive expertise, we bring credibility, stability, and a deeply consultative approach tailored to your unique needs. Built by clinicians and data experts, our platform gives payers proactive control—identifying inaccuracies before payment, not after. ClaimInsight helps you:
• Reduce overpayment risk and eliminate excessive contingency fees
• Gain transparency into how every claim is assessed
• Ensure accuracy across high-dollar and complex claims
• Meet fiduciary obligations with documentation and CAA compliance
We approach every client relationship as a true partnership, focusing on collaborative problem-solving tailored to your unique needs. Our team doesn't believe in one-size-fits-all solutions — instead, we bring creativity, strategic thinking, and a deep commitment to your success. By working closely with you, we craft customized strategies that drive real results, ensuring that every step we take together is designed specifically for your goals.
Every complex claim is reviewed by real clinicians—not just algorithms.
You decide the parameters. We customize the logic.
You see every detail—what was flagged, why, and what was recovered or avoided.
No plan design changes, no member abrasion, no provider gridlock.
From regional Medicaid plans to national payers, ClaimInsight consistently delivers millions in verified savings.
Key Insights from the Fireside Chat on Transparency, Trust, and the Future of Payment Integrity
Why Physician-Led Review is the Secret Weapon for Tackling High-Dollar Inpatient Claims
In a healthcare system strained by rising costs, waste and abuse continue to quietly drain billions from payer budgets
Payers today need more than a checkbox review—they need a partner that protects every dollar with precision. Whether you’re managing Medicaid, Medicare Advantage, or commercial populations, ClaimInsight empowers you to take control of your payment integrity strategy with confidence, visibility, and results.

“Mark is a great, supportive manager who has been a true mentor for me. Mark has coached me through my career growth, being very attuned to my goals and needs. He is a manager who leads by example and who isn't afraid to get into the details of the work. He is a manager who instills trust with his team.”
About

argos_summary: Advanced Medical Pricing Solutions (AMPS) will showcase its ClaimInsight® platform at the California Association of Health Plans (CAHP) Annual Conference, offering California payers a physician‑led, real‑time claims editing tool designed to reduce overpayments, improve claim accuracy, and streamline payment integrity. The press release highlights the urgent need for cost containment amid California’s financial strain and legislative changes, positioning ClaimInsight as a scalable solution that delivers measurable savings and operational clarity. AMPS also promotes its broader suite of cost‑control products—PriceDynamix and Drexi—while inviting conference attendees to Booth 405 for demos and discussions on optimizing Medi‑Cal claims and pre‑pay integrity processes.
